definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
South Georgia and The South Sandwich Islands
pinyin: Nan2 Qiao2 zhi4 ya4 dao3 he2 Nan2 Sang1 wei1 qi2
containing_words.word: 南乔治亚岛和南桑威奇

sentences.english: But Georgia banks blew themselves up with old-fashioned loans gone bad.
sentences.chinese: 但乔治亚州的银行却因老式贷款坏账而引爆自身。

sentences.english: Just got done setting up a few new computer to send down to our Georgia facility to replace some 6 year old computers.
sentences.chinese: 把一些在乔治亚州用了六年的旧电脑换成新的。

sentences.english: Barbecue restaurants, red clay and trees: Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 烧烤店，红色粘土和森林，这是乔治亚州。

sentences.english: After all, she was born into the Georgia bourgeoisie, a milieu rarely thought of as action-packed.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，她生于乔治亚州的中产阶级，能有什么壮举呢？

sentences.english: This sort of epiphany waits in almost every bay and inlet of South Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 类似的神迹在南乔治亚岛的每一个海湾呈现。

sentences.english: Today, Scovill Fasteners Inc. employs 250 in Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 今天，斯科维尔扣件公司在乔治亚有员工250人。

sentences.english: Theauther: "We met in my hometown in Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在我的家乡乔治亚州认识的。

sentences.english: Nearly a third of all the birds of this species nest on South Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 所有这种鸟类有将近三分之一在南乔治亚筑巢。

sentences.english: Then I thought of Eliza and Georgiana;
sentences.chinese: 随后我想起了伊丽莎和乔治亚娜。

sentences.english: Sadly , Georgia's uncle passed away yesterday after a short illness.
sentences.chinese: 真伤心，乔治亚的叔叔昨天得了一场急病去世了。

sentences.english: South Georgia suffers from a meteorological version of bi­polar disorder.
sentences.chinese: 南乔治亚岛经受着极地紊乱气候的无情摆布。

sentences.english: Georgia's uncle passed away yesterday after a short illness.
sentences.chinese: 真伤心，乔治亚的叔叔昨天得了一场急病去世了。

sentences.english: If you get caught speeding in Holly Springs, Ga., the ticket will cost you $12 more. (Atlanta Journal-Constitution)
sentences.chinese: 如果你在乔治亚州的冬青泉超速，罚款会多12美元。
哦，对，还有乔治亚理工学院。

sentences.english: Georgiana realized that her husband had been hiding his tension and fear.
sentences.chinese: 乔治亚娜意思到他的丈夫之前隐藏了他的紧张和害怕。

sentences.english: An inmate has died in Georgia after a shootout in the Jackson County Courthouse.
sentences.chinese: 乔治亚州一名囚犯在杰克逊县法院的枪击事件中死亡。

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
